basics.name: Jyrum Bohol
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Supporting the bakers and other workers with a large variety of tasks.
highlights: Working the cash register and creating sandwiches for orders
Prepping for the sandwich station and creating doughs and other sweets mixes
Bagging breads, muffins, and cookies to place them on shelves for purchase

work.summary: Assisted shop owners with packaging orders, creating boxes, and gently handling the leis
highlights: Carefully packaging leis for their journey to their new owners
Making and tying leis when necessary

volunteer.summary: Participated in several cleanups in the Palolo community
highlights: Helped out planting, clearing out greenery, and dealing with waste
Clearing out invasive fish from streams

awards.title: Hawaii B+ State Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarship awarded to incoming freshman, recognizing their academic strength and dedication towards a four year degree
